title: Blondy's Space Adventure
backCoverBlurb: Blondy wants to be an astronaut! She wants to visit the moon and see stars up close. Join Blondy as she blasts off into the deep blue space.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy smile. She is wearing a silver space suit with a red star on the chest.

pages.text: Blondy looked up at the night sky. She wanted to go to space!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with curly blonde hair looking out of her window at the stars.

pages.text: She put on her silver space suit and her clear helmet.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy wearing a shiny astronaut suit and smiling.

pages.text: 3... 2... 1... BLAST OFF! The rocket went into the sky.
pages.imagePrompt: A rocket ship flying upwards with a trail of white smoke.

pages.text: Blondy could see the big, round Earth behind her.
pages.imagePrompt: The blue and green Earth seen from a rocket window.

pages.text: She saw the silvery moon getting closer and closer.
pages.imagePrompt: The moon with craters seen through the dark space.

pages.text: Bump! The rocket landed softly on the moon's surface.
pages.imagePrompt: A rocket ship sitting on the dusty, grey moon.

pages.text: Blondy stepped out and jumped. Boing! Boing!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy jumping high on the moon, looking weightless.

pages.text: She found a shiny, golden star on the moon's ground.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy holding a glowing golden star in her hands.

pages.text: The stars were even brighter and bigger in space.
pages.imagePrompt: Distant galaxies and clusters of twinkling stars.

pages.text: It was time for the astronaut to go back home.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sitting in the cockpit, ready to fly back.

pages.text: The rocket landed safely back in Blondy's garden.
pages.imagePrompt: The rocket in a green garden under the moonlight.

pages.text: Blondy closed her eyes. She was a super space explorer!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sleeping in her bed, hugging a toy rocket.
